price: 3 Nous lui avons indiqué la voie à suivre, qu’il se montre reconnaissant[1522] ou ingrat.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
